com.here.mobility.sdk.core

Class MobilitySdk

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.here.mobility.sdk.core.MobilitySdk

  • public class MobilitySdk
extends Object
    The non-static entrance class for Here's Mobility SDK.

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static MobilitySdk getInstance()
        The singleton getInstance method.
        Throws:
        HereSdkInitializationException - if called before calling MobilitySdk.init(android.app.Application)

      • init

        public static void init(Application app)
        Call this method from your app's Application.onCreate() method to initialize the SDK.

      • init

        public static void init(Application app,
                        String apiKey)
        Call this method from your app's Application.onCreate() method to initialize the SDK
        Parameters:
        app - the application instance
        apiKey - api key to use instead of setting it in manifest

      • isHereAgentProcess

        public boolean isHereAgentProcess()
        Returns whether the current process is the SDK agent process.

      • getVersionName

        public String getVersionName()
        Returns the SDK version name.
        Returns:
        sdk version name

      • getLoggingId

        public String getLoggingId()
        Returns a logging id. This id can be used to query Here Mobility SDK logs.
        Returns:
        logging id

      • setUserAuthInfo

        public void setUserAuthInfo(HereSdkUserAuthInfo userAuthInfo)
        Sets the current user of the SDK. The SDK will persist the value for future uses, so need to call this method only once per HereSdkUserAuthInfo, and renew it when the HereSdkUserAuthInfo is expired, or when the user is switched. Calling this method with other HereSdkUserAuthInfo.getUserId() will invalidate the user verification, so the new user will have to be re-verified by calling MobilitySdk.verifyPhoneNumber(String, String)
        Parameters:
        userAuthInfo - The current user of the application. Pass null to log-out the current user

      • sendVerificationSms

        public ResponseFuture<Void> sendVerificationSms(String phoneNumber)
        Send verification SMS to the given phone number, that contains a pin code. Call MobilitySdk.verifyPhoneNumber(String, String) with the given phone number and the pin code to verify the phone number, and allow access to the demand marketplace.
        Parameters:
        phoneNumber - the phone number of the device. Should be in E.164 format
        Returns:
        ResponseFuture that return nothing in case the SMS was sent successfully. In case of failure will hold ResponseException that contains IOException in case of network failure, or VerificationSmsResponseException in case of error from the server, like invalid phone number

      • verifyPhoneNumber

        public ResponseFuture<Void> verifyPhoneNumber(String phoneNumber,
                                              String pinCode)
        Verifies the given phone number. Must be called before calling operations that requires high level of verification, such as booking a ride. Use this function after calling MobilitySdk.sendVerificationSms(String) and pass the pin code received by the SMS message.
        Parameters:
        phoneNumber - the phone number of the device. Should be in E.164 format
        pinCode - the pin code that was received by SMS
        Returns:
        ResponseFuture that holds exception in case of failure, and return nothing in case the user was verified successfully.

      • isVerified

        public boolean isVerified()
        Is the current user is verified and eligible for operations that requires high level of verification, such as booking a ride. The user is verified by calling MobilitySdk.verifyPhoneNumber(String, String)
        Returns:
        is the current user verified

      • getUserAuthInfo

        public HereSdkUserAuthInfo getUserAuthInfo()
        Returns the user information; null when not supplied by the app.

      • isInitialized

        public static boolean isInitialized()
        Checks if the MobilitySdk was initialized
        Returns:
        true if the MobilitySdk was initialized

      • getApiKey

        public String getApiKey()
        Returns the developer's API key.

      • getUserPreferences

        public UserPreferences getUserPreferences()
        Returns the user preferences.

      • setUserPreferences

        public void setUserPreferences(UserPreferences userPreferences)
        Sets the SDK user preferences. NOTE: The user preferences are not persisted to storage.
